archimate:Requirement.name: Control Measures
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Defined the organization and not by the ESA team.
The basis for the Control Measures are the "stubs" described in each SOGP Topic. The Controls are defined by the rest of the organization and not by the ESA team.
The Standards Of Good Practice (SOGP) provides guidelines for how Controls should be defined. Therefore, anyone who defines a Control should base it on the Standards Of Good Practice Statements and Stubs and/or the Stub's Sub-Points.
If a Statement is adopted as a Control, the Control will influence the Statement with a positive influence. If an entire Stub is adopted as a Control, the Control will realize the Stub with a positive influence and indirectly all of its Sub-Points. If only some of the Sub-Points under a Stub is adopted into Controls, the Control will realize some of the Sub-Points with a positive influence.
